     934             :     /// Stable sort using in-place merge sort algorithm.
     935             :     /// Copyright 2001 Simon Tatham.
     936             :     ///
     937             :     /// Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person

     953             :     /// ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF

     955             :     /// CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
     956             :     /// SOFTWARE.

     958             :     template <typename TCompare>
     959          54 :     void sort(TCompare compare)
     960             :     {

     973             :         return;

     977             :       {
     978          73 :         i_left = begin();
     979          73 :         i_head = end();
     980          73 :         i_tail = end();

     982          73 :         number_of_merges = 0;  // Count the number of merges we do in this pass.
     983             :

     987         151 :           i_right = i_left;

    1188             :     //*************************************************************************
    1189             :     /// Merge another list into this one. Both lists should be sorted.

    1192             :     void merge(list_type& other, TCompare compare)
    1193             :     {

    1195             :       {
